A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just when I thought they couldn’t ruin this franchise even more they did. This movie had no real plot. I was confused the whole time trying to figure out where it was going. No structure whatsoever. It didn’t feel like a Star Wars movie at all. They turned the Jedi master Luke skywalks into a Emo cry baby. “Sith lord snook” died like he was nothing. May I add they didn’t even explain who he was or where he came from. Poor actions scenes. Pointless casino rescue adventure with two characters that had no value or purpose to the mission. To top it al off just when you think there will be an epic lightsaber duel you find out that it’s nothing more Than a tease. Hate hate hate what they’ve done to such an amazing saga. As far as I’m concerned these are not cannon. The Star Wars trilogy ended when George Lucus sold the rights to Disney. Return of the Jedi is and will forever be the ending to an unforgettable trilogy.
